summary:
Adds a small player home to the Haafingar region in Skyrim!
If you like collecting player houses, this could be one for you!
descriptionHtml:
Edit3.June.14|| Fixed the Location Descovery! Install Version 1.2! (Note: WeaponPlaque and BookShelf still broken)

Edit3.June.14|| The location on the Map is north of Haafingar, just go along the coast line... Sometime soon I will get working on the bugs! And Thanks for the views and downloads!! :D

Pretty much my first official mod created here in Skyrim.
I know there may be a few problems, if you can help me fix them, please tell me!!

I need help, if anyone knows how I can create these things, or knows any links, I'd appreciate it!

Originally made for my boyfriend, Allam :) <3

Description:
A quite Imperial Outpost, waiting for a Player to come along and use.
The Outpost has a Blacksmiths area, cooking area, smelter and tanning area.
It also has a medium sized pier dock, with a ship and a few small long boats.

Inside there is enough room for you to place your 'forever building up items' chests and wardrobe!
2 Beds, a double and a single downstairs for your follower ect, and training posts.

Requirements:
The only thing you need is the latest version of Skyrim!

Thanks to:
MrAndersonLP
LouisAt444
For teaching me how to make the Player home! [Youtube]
and Thanks to Gopher on Youtube for teaching me about modding and what to look out for!
Thanks to morganmarz for bug fixes!

Recent!Bugs:
- Weapon Plaques still don't work.
- Book shelf broken.

ChangeLog:
Ver1.1 - Bugs: No location on Map, Weapon Plaques inactive. [2.5.14]
Ver1.2 - Fixed Location discovery. [3.5.14]
Ver1.2.1 - COMING SOON! Fix Weapon Plaques and Book Shelf.



-Cait
author: DoodleBugRain
